summary:
A qualified and experienced Senior Production Geologist, with effective communication skills, and technical experience in reservoir geology.

Specialties: · Skilled in 3D reservoir modeling of Carbonate fields with very good presentation skill.
· High level knowledge in fracture analysis and modeling.
· Skilled in thermal GOGD development concepts and field development planning.
· Skilled in Operation geology and reservoir management
